Package index

Player Statistics

Functions to retrieve individual player statistics

player_per_game()
Get NBA player per game stats
player_totals()
Get NBA player totals
player_per_minute()
Get NBA player per 36 minutes stats
player_per_poss()
Get NBA player per 100 possessions stats
player_advanced()
Get NBA player advanced stats
player_shooting()
Get NBA player shooting stats
player_pbp()
Get NBA player play-by-play stats
player_stats_bulk()
Get player statistics for multiple players

Team Statistics - Season Specific

Functions to retrieve team statistics for specific seasons

team_per_game()
Get team per game statistics
team_totals()
Get team totals statistics
team_per_poss()
Get team per 100 possessions statistics
team_advanced()
Get team advanced statistics
team_per_minute()
Get team per minute statistics
team_shooting()
Get team shooting statistics
team_pbp()
Get team play-by-play statistics
team_roster()
Get team roster
team_stats_bulk()
Get team statistics for multiple teams and/or years

Team Statistics - Historical Aggregates

Functions to retrieve historical team statistics across all seasons

team_stats_totals()
Get team aggregate totals across all seasons
team_stats_per_game()
Get team aggregate per game stats across all seasons

League Statistics

Functions to retrieve league-wide statistics

league_per_game()
Get NBA league averages per game
league_totals()
Get NBA league totals
league_per_poss()
Get NBA league per 100 possessions stats

Championship & Playoff Data

Functions to retrieve championship and playoff information

champions()
Get NBA champions list

Player Search

Functions to search for players

find_player_id()
Find player ID by name (internal function)
